summary: Penn State is a large public research university in Pennsylvania, USA. It was founded in 1855 and became the state's land-grant university in 1863. The main campus is in State College. Penn State has many campuses across Pennsylvania and is known for its research and athletics. It has won lots of national sports championships and its students have won Olympic medals. The university offers a wide range of programs, including law and medicine.
title: Pennsylvania State University
